description: Kensington Lofts by award-winning Vesta Properties! This stunning 3-level townhome boasts a 365 sq. ft. rooftop patio â€”perfect for entertaining while enjoying unobstructed western valley & mountain views. The bright, open-concept great room is filled with natural light, showcasing a modern white kitchen with quartz counters, center island & stainless steel appliances. Upstairs offers 3 spacious bedrooms, including a luxurious primary suite with spa-inspired ensuite. A main floor flex room adds versatility for office, playroom, or gym. Parking is exceptional with a side-by-side double garage plus extended driveway (fits 4 cars!) Situated in one of the best locations in the complex, this home offers privacy, plenty of street parking, and easy access to trails, shops, transit & more.
